name: pgsql-ast-parser
description: Yet another simple Postgres SQL parser/modifier

scripts.release: npm run release-node && npm run release-deno
scripts.release-node: git diff --exit-code && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run build && cp -r src lib/src && npm run build:deno && deno run deno-test.ts && cd lib && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.release-deno: git add -A && git commit -m "Build deno [autogenerated commit]" && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag $PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.deno:gen: nearleyc src/syntax/main.ne -o .deno/syntax/main.ne.ts && nearleyc src/literal-syntaxes/array.ne -o .deno/literal-syntaxes/array.ne.ts&& nearleyc src/literal-syntaxes/geometric.ne -o .deno/literal-syntaxes/geometric.ne.ts&& nearleyc src/literal-syntaxes/interval.ne -o .deno/literal-syntaxes/interval.ne.ts&& nearleyc src/literal-syntaxes/interval-iso.ne -o .deno/literal-syntaxes/interval-iso.ne.ts
scripts.build:deno: rimraf .deno && node ./deno-transpile.js --copy && npm run deno:gen && node ./deno-transpile.js --process
scripts.cover: cross-env NODE_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text npm run test

author: Olivier Guimbal
